overview:
Poly skilled Programmer with hands on knowledge of Ruby, Java, C++, C, Objective C, C#, Scala programming languages, Rails, Spring, Hibernate, ASP.NET, jQuery web technologies, BREW, J2ME, iPhone based mobile technologies. AIR, Flash, .NET based desktop app development experience. He has strong OOP and Design Patterns skill, deep understanding of OOAD, Xtreme Programming and Agile practices.

At Umundo Inc, he built the video social network named Umundo (http://umundo.com) to enable public and private sharing of videos and socialization around it. More recently he was instrumental in building the popular multimedia twitter app - Tvider (http://tvider.com). Tvider is being widely used on various mobile phone platforms ranging from iPhone, Android to BREW, Symbian based phones. It is launched on Verizon VCast app store, Tata, Airtel & Reliance networks in India, Cellmania, GetJar and Hutch Thailand.

Specialties Software Designing, Architecting, Programming. Product Conceptualization, Workflow design, Release Management. Team motivation, orientation and training.
